title: 10 years items
body:
So since the ten years stuff is almost up, i need to ask, how can i tell i got the mystery gift, or Riot Kayle? I think i remember getting Riot Kayle from Hextech a while ago, but if you gave it to me (and i did not receive a notification) please do let me know. Since i would like to actually know if i received one or the other (seeing as i only got a popup for the Poro icon, but nothing in terms of the skin, or the mystery skin). 

Is there anyway i can tell if i got ether the mystery skin, or Riot Kayle from you Riot?

replies.body: We're aiming to wrap up distributing gifts today, but the day is not over yet!  Keep tabs on our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) on updates, and hang tight until this is all wrapped up!  The goods are coming!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yX9EkwQ6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-30T20:43:23.838+0000)
>
> We're aiming to wrap up distributing gifts today, but the day is not over yet!  Keep tabs on our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) on updates, and hang tight until this is all wrapped up!  The goods are coming!

Alright! Thank you very much for letting me know Riot Porocles! Also for some weird reason it says i am not authorized to view the page.
If you check the purchase history when you are in the account area while in the store you should see all the gifts sent to your account.

> [{quoted}](name=Lew,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yX9EkwQ6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-30T02:05:57.194+0000)
>
> If you check the purchase history when you are in the account area while in the store you should see all the gifts sent to your account.

I checked that, but all i got was the Icon. that's all no other gifts, at all.
